content: PTH SD Zi Self-drilling framing screws Interior metal framing screw (zinc-plated) for fastening stud or wire lath to track ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Screws- - - ### FEATURES:Features The screws can be driven quickly thanks to their optimized drill point geometry Hilti has full control of the manufacturing process – delivering reliable, consistent quality Precisely matched to Hilti drivers and bits – helping to achieve high-quality fastenings every time All Hilti drill-point screws meet or exceed ASTM C 954 performance requirements Applications Fastening wire lath to metal studs – maximum combined thickness 0.112 inch Fastening track to studs – maximum combined thickness 0.112 inch ### TECHNICAL DATA: Screw head type: Pancake head Screw drive/recess type: TX 25 HF Collated: No Technical Data | Screw head type | Truss head | Screw drive/recess type | PH #2 | Collated | No | Drilling capacity - min (ga) | 20 ga | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor ### ITEMS- 2098865 - Drywall screw S-DD 12-14x1 TPCH3 Z - Package Size 5000 pc
